mapper.insert: insert into user(email, pwd, name, tel_no, eml_auth_tkn, in_user, up_user) value (#{email}, #{pwd}, #{name}, #{telNo}, #{emlAuthTkn}, current_user , current_user)
mapper.select: select count(*) from user where in_date between date_sub(curdate(), interval 3 day) and date_add(curdate(), interval 1 day)
